headline: Constellation Brands: Resilient Beer Growth But Challenges Weigh On Outlook (Rating Downgrade)
summary: STZ's 3Q25 results were mixed, with beer segment growth slowing and the Wine & Spirits segment continuing to underperform, dragging overall performance. Read more here.
